message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe you'll love it, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny. I'm offering it to you for $950000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to consider the value of the product as well. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm now offering the product to you for $850000. What do you think?
